parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If you have no special requirements, leave this parameter empty.**

The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The list of images. The sequence of image URIs in the list determines the order in which they are converted.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags. You can search for or filter asynchronous tasks by custom tag.

parameters.name: TargetURI
parameters.description:
The OSS URI of the output file.

Specify the OSS URI in the oss://${bucketname}/${objectname} format, where ${bucketname} is the name of the bucket in the same region as the current project and ${objectname} is the path of the object with the extension included.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom information, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length of the value is 2,048 bytes.
